result.title: 2009 British Geological Survey, Seabed mapping and surveys (BGS_multibeam)
result.name: 2009-british-geological-survey-seabed-mapping-and-surveys-bgs-multibeam
result.notes:
This shapefile outlines the current multi-beam data holdings of the British Geological Survey. The multibeam has been collected from a variety of vessels and contractors for the purpose of seabed mapping.  Surveys may not meet all requirements of IHO order 1.
     The data is available for download in various formats from The Maritime and Coastguard Agency (MCA) website.

extras.value: ["Available to download in various formats from the The Maritime and Coastguard Agency (MCA) website. The dataset should be acknowledged to BGS."]

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network

harvest.value: Marine Environmental Data Information Network (MEDIN) node hosted by MARIS (Netherlands)
